translations: 精通外国语言的人；语言学家

sentences.sentence: As a linguist once said, "You can get people to think it's nonsense at the same time that you buy into it."
sentences.translation: 正如一位语言学家曾经说过的那样：“你可以让人们认为这是无稽之谈，但同时你又会相信它。”

sentences.sentence: As a linguist once said, "You can get people to think it's nonsense at the same time that you buy into it. “
sentences.translation: 正如一位语言学家曾经说过的那样：“你可以让人们认为它是无稽之谈，但同时你又对它深信不疑。”

sentences.sentence: Cummings boldly experimented with this principle, and he attracted the attention of the linguists, particularly a linguist named Dell Hymes.
sentences.translation: 卡明斯大胆地试验了这一原则，他吸引了语言学家的注意，尤其是一位名叫戴尔·海姆斯的语言学家。
